event.description: Augie Ojeda doubles (4) on a fly ball to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Conor Jackson strikes out swinging.
Chad Tracy strikes out swinging.
Mark Reynolds pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Justin Upton singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Miguel Montero strikes out swinging.
Chris Young called out on strikes.
Josh Wilson pops out to third baseman Casey Blake in foul territory.
Max Scherzer singles on a ground ball to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Augie Ojeda singles on a line drive to right fielder Andre Ethier. Max Scherzer to 2nd.
Conor Jackson grounds into a force out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to second baseman Orlando Hudson. Max Scherzer to 3rd. Augie Ojeda out at 2nd. Conor Jackson to 1st.
Chad Tracy pops out to shortstop Rafael Furcal.
With Mark Reynolds batting, wild pitch by Jeff Weaver, Max Scherzer scores. Conor Jackson to 2nd.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Justin Upton bunt grounds out, pitcher Jeff Weaver to first baseman James Loney.
Miguel Montero hits a ground-rule double (1) on a line drive to right field.
Chris Young grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman James Loney. Miguel Montero to 3rd.
Josh Wilson walks.
Max Scherzer pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Augie Ojeda grounds out to first baseman James Loney.
Conor Jackson reaches on a fielding error by right fielder Andre Ethier.
Chad Tracy lines out to left fielder Manny Ramirez.
With Mark Reynolds batting, Conor Jackson steals (5) 2nd base.
Mark Reynolds strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Ramon Troncoso replaces Jeff Weaver, batting 9th.
Justin Upton grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman James Loney.
Miguel Montero called out on strikes.
Chris Young singles on a ground ball to shortstop Rafael Furcal.
With Josh Wilson batting, Chris Young steals (3) 2nd base.
Josh Wilson grounds out, pitcher Ramon Troncoso to first baseman James Loney.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eric Byrnes replaces Max Scherzer.
Eric Byrnes grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman James Loney.
Augie Ojeda singles on a line drive to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Conor Jackson flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Pitching Change: Will Ohman replaces Ramon Troncoso, batting 9th.
Chad Tracy grounds out, shortstop Rafael Furcal to first baseman James Loney.
Pitching Change: Ronald Belisario replaces Will Ohman, batting 9th, replacing Juan Pierre.
Mark Reynolds hit by pitch.
Justin Upton called out on strikes.
Miguel Montero strikes out on a foul tip.
With Chris Young batting, Mark Reynolds steals (3) 2nd base.
Chris Young called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Jonathan Broxton replaces Ronald Belisario, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ryan Roberts replaces Josh Wilson.
Ryan Roberts called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Felipe Lopez replaces Scott Schoeneweis.
Felipe Lopez strikes out swinging.
Augie Ojeda grounds out, second baseman Orlando Hudson to first baseman James Loney.
Rafael Furcal called out on strikes.
Orlando Hudson doubles (9) on a line drive to left fielder Conor Jackson.
Max Scherzer intentionally walks Manny Ramirez.
Andre Ethier singles on a line drive to right fielder Justin Upton. Orlando Hudson scores. Manny Ramirez to 3rd.
James Loney grounds out, second baseman Augie Ojeda to first baseman Chad Tracy. Manny Ramirez scores. Andre Ethier to 2nd.
Russell Martin reaches on a throwing error by shortstop Josh Wilson. Andre Ethier scores.
With Matt Kemp batting, Russell Martin steals (2) 2nd base, . Russell Martin advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Miguel Montero.
Matt Kemp grounds out, second baseman Augie Ojeda to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Casey Blake strikes out swinging.
Jeff Weaver called out on strikes.
Rafael Furcal lines out to center fielder Chris Young.
Orlando Hudson grounds out, shortstop Josh Wilson to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Manny Ramirez grounds out, third baseman Mark Reynolds to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Andre Ethier walks.
James Loney grounds out, second baseman Augie Ojeda to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Russell Martin lines out to third baseman Mark Reynolds.
Matt Kemp strikes out swinging.
Casey Blake singles on a fly ball to center fielder Chris Young, deflected by right fielder Justin Upton.
Jeff Weaver singles on a ground ball to center fielder Chris Young. Casey Blake to 2nd.
Rafael Furcal grounds out, second baseman Augie Ojeda to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Orlando Hudson bunt grounds out, pitcher Max Scherzer to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Manny Ramirez grounds out, shortstop Josh Wilson to first baseman Chad Tracy.

Matt Kemp flies out to left fielder Conor Jackson.
Pitching Change: Juan Gutierrez replaces Max Scherzer, batting 9th, replacing Eric Byrnes.
Casey Blake strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Juan Pierre replaces Will Ohman.

Rafael Furcal flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.

Manny Ramirez flies out to left fielder Conor Jackson.
Pitching Change: Scott Schoeneweis replaces Juan Gutierrez, batting 9th.
